front.title: SIP MARTINI Variant of 'Event-package for Registrations' for Managed Open-ended Username Target Handling (VERMOUTH)

abstract.t: The Martini Working Group is defining a mechanism for SIP IP-PBX type devices to REGISTER and obtain SIP service for E.164-based Address of Records, in [draft-gin]. Another draft [draft-olive] proposes the same for non-E.164-based AoRs. This document defines a variant of the Registration Event-package [reg-event] for open-ended AoRs for either mechanisms, using a wildcard syntax and specific target handling rules.
